author: IGN
description:
Check out the Rabbit Trap trailer for this upcoming film starring Dev Patel, Rosy McEwen, and Jade Croot. Rabbit Trap opens in theaters on September 12, 2025.

Darcy (Patel) and Daphne (McEwen) Davenport are freshly decamped from London and taking up residence in an isolated cottage deep in the Welsh countryside in search of creative renewal and acoustic inspiration. When the couple set about exploring their new environs, recording instruments in tow, Darcy stumbles upon a “faerie circle” that emits a strange, unidentifiable frequency; this odd discovery is followed closely by the appearance of an otherworldly child (Croot) who claims to live nearby and is eager to befriend the Davenports. Soon the child becomes a fixture in their household, alternately ingratiating himself and raising suspicions, and exposing unacknowledged rifts and unexamined secrets that threaten to wreak psychological and spiritual havoc in the lives of his makeshift adoptive parents. 

Directed and written by Br
title: Rabbit Trap - Official Trailer (2025) Dev Patel, Rosy McEwen

author: IGN
description:
In the African American neighborhood of Sag Harbor, New York, Charles Blakey (Corey Hawkins) is out of work, out of luck, and on the verge of foreclosure on his ancestral home. A knock on the door from a mysterious businessman, Anniston Bennet (Willem Dafoe), brings a bizarre and lucrative proposition; rent his dusty stand-up basement out for the summer and receive enough money to clear his debts for good. Once Charles accepts, he finds himself led down a terrifying path that confronts his family’s ghosts and locks the men in a terrifying puzzle, at the heart of it, race, the source of their traumas and the root of all evil.

#ign #TheManInMyBasement
title: The Man In My Basement - Official Trailer (2025) Corey Hawkins, Willem Dafoe

author: IGN
description: Dive into the dystopian cyberpunk world of Neo Berlin 2087 in this new trailer for the upcoming third-person and first-person action RPG. Meet new characters Bryan and Phoenix in this latest action-packed Neo Berlin 2087 gamescom 2025 trailer, and check out gameplay, combat, get a peek at new levels, and cinematic cutscenes. Neo Berlin 2087 will be available on PC, Xbox Series X/S, and PlayStation 5 (PS5).
title: Neo Berlin 2087 - Official Gamescom 2025 Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: We react to a new since-confirmed report that 2K's new BioShock game continues to find its footing. We discuss where the project is and what the BioShock IP still means to gamers. #BioShock4 #Xbox #gaming
title: Why BioShock 4 Still Isn’t Ready - Unlocked Clips

author: IGN
description:
This desert is definitely not a empty barren wasteland. Take a tour of the desert stage in the latest Shinobi: Art of Vengeance trailer for the upcoming action platformer game. Check out the trailer to see enemies you'll encounter in this Shinobi: Art of Vengeance desert level, but beware, as the sand itself is a potent adversary. Shinobi: Art of Vengeance will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS4), Nintendo Switch, Xbox, and Steam on August 29, 2025.

#ign #gaming
title: Shinobi: Art of Vengeance - Official Desert Stage Introduction Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Meet Amon and learn about this character in this new Borderlands 4 character short for the upcoming first-person action looter shooter game. Borderlands 4 will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam) on September 12, 2025, and on Nintendo Switch 2 on October 3, 2025.

Amon was raised in a Vault monster-worshipping cult—until the Vault was opened and the creature turned on everyone he loved. As the only survivor, he dedicates his life to finding and killing as many of these beasts as he can. He is a warrior-poet—introspective and unflinching to his duty—but despite his hardened appearance, he has a warm attitude, often regaling comrades in arms with stories and advice earned throughout his travels.

#ign #gaming
title: Borderlands 4 - Official Character Short: Amon (Demons) Trailer

author: IGN
description:
A new piece of the story has arrived. Check out the LEGO Star Wars: Rebuild the Galaxy - Pieces of the Past trailer for the upcoming animated four-piece sequel series. LEGO Star Wars: Rebuild the Galaxy - Pieces of the Past debuts on Disney+ September 19, 2025.

LEGO Star Wars: Rebuild the Galaxy – Pieces of the Past continues the story that began in 2024 with LEGO Star Wars: Rebuild the Galaxy. A new threat rises in the galaxy, and Sig and Dev Greebling must combine their powers of Force Building and Sith Breaking to stop it. Alongside Jedi Bob, Yesi Scala, and Servo, they will journey into the deepest corners of LEGO Star Wars lore, uncovering pieces of all the galaxies that have come before.

The returning voice cast includes Gaten Matarazzo as Sig Greebling, Tony Revolori as Dev Greebling, Bobby Moynihan as Jedi Bob, Marsai Martin as Yesi Scala, Michael Cusack as Servo, Billy Dee Williams as Landolorian, Ahmed Best as Darth Jar Jar, Anthony Daniels as C-3PO, Sam Witwer as Maul, He
title: LEGO Star Wars: Rebuild the Galaxy - Pieces of the Past -- Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Sherman Commander announcement trailer for this upcoming tactical tank warfare simulation game. Sherman Commander will be available on PC via Steam.

Sherman Commander brings a new perspective on realism in tactical tank warfare simulation by presenting the tank as a slow, lumbering war machine that requires the effort of the entire crew to operate. Command your own vehicle together with a whole platoon of Sherman tanks over the most famous theatres of WW2. Take the commander’s seat and give specific orders to your crew and remaining tanks, or open the tactical map to coordinate your actions with accompanying units.

#ign #gaming
title: Sherman Commander - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Alien: Earth is bringing the plural Aliens back to the franchise with a menagerie of new extra terrestrial life. It’s not quite like James Cameron chucking dozens of xenomrophs at us through the air ducts, but Noah Hawley and the team behind the new FX series joined IGN to talk about the kind of grotesque feeling he wanted to evoke with the latest creepy-crawly additions to the Alien franchise. 

Hawley breaks down the design of these new creatures, from the real world inspirations, to managing the contribution of HR Giger, Ridley Scott and David Fincher, and how to protect the iconic silhouette of the xenomorph from an eyeball octopus.

#IGN
title: How the Grotesque Creatures of Alien: Earth Were Made

author: IGN
description:
Duckside is launching into early access on Xbox Series X|S and PlayStation 5 (PS5) on September 3, 2025. Check out the latest Duckside trailer for this persistent-world survival shooter game.

In Duckside, you'll fight against feathered and featherless foes in PvE and PvP action while gathering loot and materials to create a base and complete missions across a giant archipelago, solo or with a flock. Other ducks may be looking to steal your items from under your beak, so protect your territory! Fortify your base, upgrade your weapons, team up with friends to hunt, or simply steal from other ducks.

#ign #gaming
title: Duckside - Official Console Early Access Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest PowerWash Simulator 2 trailer for another look at this upcoming powerwashing game sequel. The new PowerWash Simulator 2 trailer also reveals pricing details for the game. PowerWash Simulator 2 will be available on PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and Windows), Xbox Series X/S, and PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#IGN #PowerWashSimulator2 #Simulator
title: PowerWash Simulator 2 - Official Price Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
We've got an exclusive first look inside the Avatar: The Last Airbender Beginner Box, which aims to make Magic: The Gathering easier to learn for new players as part of its upcoming crossover with the Avatar cartoon show. So, whether you're a new player who wants to learn how to play MTG, or you're a seasoned TCG professional with an appreciation for everything Aang and Zuko, this Magic Starter Kit will have you covered.

#IGN #Gaming #MagicTheGathering #Avatar #AvatarTheLastAirBender
title: Inside Avatar: The Last Airbender's Beginner Box for Magic: The Gathering

author: IGN
description:
Dark Deity 2 launches on Nintendo Switch September 4, 2025!  

Pre-orders now live on Nintendo eShop!

The next chapter in the beloved tactical RPG series is coming to Nintendo Switch!

Command legendary heroes, master deep strategy, and shape the fate of Verroa in this fully customizable, story-rich adventure.  

 Lead the Eternal Delegation – Command 20 heroes across 45 unique classes in intense, turn-based battles.

 Customize Your Strategy – Build unique class paths, craft powerful combos, and shape the battlefield your way.

 Decisions That Matter – Forge alliances, betray rivals, and determine Verroa’s future.
title: Dark Deity 2 - Official Nintendo Switch Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The duo’s back together — and no acorn is safe. 

Check out the latest Disney Speedstorm trailer as Dale joins Chip in Season 14 of the racing game. The new Disney Speedstorm trailer showcases Dale's abilities and what you can expect from this character.

#IGN #DisneySpeedstorm #ChipAndDale
title: Disney Speedstorm - Official Dale Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Build from the best of both leagues in NBA 2K26 MyTEAM. 

Check out the latest NBA 2K26 trailer to see what you can expect from MyTEAM, featuring the ability to collect and play with WNBA Player Cards, and pair them with your favorite NBA superstars in the same lineups. NBA 2K26 will be available on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam) on September 5, 2025.

#IGN #NBA #MyTEAM
title: NBA 2K26 - Official MyTEAM Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get ready to scurry and scramble your way to freedom. Chicken Run: Eggstraction gets a new trailer and a release date announcement. 

Stealth, silliness, and a whole lot of chaos! Watch the latest Chicken Run: Eggstraction trailer for the upcoming co-op adventure set in the Chicken Run universe. Chicken Run: Eggstraction will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and Steam on October 24, 2025. A demo is available on Steam today (August 14) until August 18, 2025.

#IGN #ChickenRun #ChickenRunEggstraction
title: Chicken Run: Eggstraction - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Sea of Thieves Season 17: Smugglers' Tide is available now. 

Watch the Sea of Thieves Season 17 launch trailer to see what you can expect from this new season, which brings the arrival of the Smugglers' League, black powder barrels, smugglers' route runs, new cosmetics, 100 levels of seasonal rewards, an emporium refresh, pirate profiles, and more to the pirate adventure game.

#IGN #SeaOfThieves #Season17
title: Sea of Thieves Season 17 - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get another look at Marvel Studios’ Thunderbolts in this latest trailer for the MCU film. Thunderbolts stars Florence Pugh, Sebastian Stan, Wyatt Russell, Olga Kurylenko, Lewis Pullman, Geraldine Viswanathan, Chris Bauer, Wendell Pierce, with David Harbour, with Hannah John-Kamen, and Julia Louis-Dreyfus. Marvel Studios’ Thunderbolts will be available to stream on Disney+ August 27, 2025.

In Thunderbolts, Marvel Studios assembles an unconventional team of antiheroes—Yelena Belova, Bucky Barnes, Red Guardian, Ghost, Taskmaster and John Walker. After finding themselves ensnared in a death trap set by Valentina Allegra de Fontaine, these disillusioned castoffs must embark on a dangerous mission that will force them to confront the darkest corners of their pasts. Will this dysfunctional group tear themselves apart, or find redemption and unite as something much more before it’s too late?

Jake Schreier directs Thunderbolts and Kevin Feige is the producer. Louis D’Esposito, Brian Chapek a
title: Marvel Studios’ Thunderbolts - Official Disney+ Release Date Trailer (2025) Florence Pugh

author: IGN
description:
The fans made it happen! Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 35th Anniversary re-release is in theaters for ONE FULL WEEK starting tomorrow, August 15th-21st. Go to FathomEntertainment.com to get tickets now and to find the theater nearest you: https://hubs.ly/Q03tq_4m0 

Check out the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 35th Anniversary theatrical run trailer for the original 1990 superhero film of the comic book adaptation starring the iconic characters Leonardo, Michelangelo, Donatello, and Raphael. 

From New Line Cinema and directed by the legendary film and music video director Steve Barron, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 35th Anniversary will also present the Turtles Unmasked featurette. Produced in collaboration with the creators of TMNT: Evolution, Mutation & Reboot, the featurette showcases before the movie—never-before-seen footage from the archives, extended scenes left to history on the cutting room floor, home-recorded behind-the-scenes footage, and 1-on-1 time and commentary with Barro
title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 35th Anniversary Re-Release - Official Final Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Meet the members of the Reclaimers faction in this latest Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion trailer for the upcoming dark sci-fi action game. 

An underground resistance organization, the Reclaimers are a covert network banded together to fight back against the rule of the Sovereign Axiom. Using a series of hidden passages and throughways, the Reclaimers are able to work in secret, avoiding the watchful eyes of the Axiom. Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion will be available on Nintendo Switch 2, PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and Windows PC via Steam on September 5, 2025.

#IGN #DaemonXMachina #ActionGames
title: Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion - Official Reclaimers Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Meet the Sovereign Axiom’s Special Services, 9th Division – also known as the Neun. Watch the latest Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion trailer for the upcoming dark sci-fi action game to get an introduction to the members of the Neun. This special forces unit has exceptional combat powers, and under the leadership of Void, show no mercy to the opposition. That’s why the humans have dubbed them “Demons of Heaven.” 

Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion will be available on Nintendo Switch 2, PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and Windows PC via Steam on September 5, 2025.

#IGN #DaemonXMachina #ActionGames
title: Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion - Official The Neun Trailer

author: IGN
description:
How difficult is Ninja Gaiden 4? How do weapons work? Following our recent Ninja Gaiden 4 hands-on preview, we asked all of you what questions you still had about Team Ninja's upcoming Ninja Gaiden sequel. 

We've selected the best of those questions and done our best to answer them in this follow-up video featuring IGN previews editor Ryan McCaffrey and Ninja Gaiden 4 previewer Mitchell Saltzman.

00:00 - Intro
01:15 - What are the difficulty levels for Ninja Gaiden 4?
02:29 - Does Ryu have multiple or just one weapon?
05:15 - Are the enemies punishing like in OG Ninja Gaiden 2, or are they damage sponges like NG2 Sigma?
06:10 - How is the performance of Ninja Gaiden 4?
07:21 - Are there secondary weapons like windmill shuriken?
07:40 - Can you cancel attack animations with a block or dodge like in other Platinum games?
08:33 - How did you feel about Ryu (apparently) only having one weapon compared to Yakumo's four or five? 
10:07 - Is there real-time weapon switching?
11:04 - How'd
title: We Played Ninja Gaiden 4. You Had Questions. We Have Answers.

author: IGN
description:
Four years after Bob Odenkirk surprisingly proved he could kill onscreen bad guys in a ruthless manner that would make 1980s-era Schwarzenegger and Stallone pause, the Better Call Saul star returns as Hutch Mansell in Nobody 2. While not quite as strong as the first film, this is ultimately an example of a sequel that offers the-same-but-different in a suitably satisfying and crowdpleasing way.

Sharon Stone as a scenery-chewing villain with Colin Hanks and a bad haircut in tow, add to the carnival like atmosphere of the action-comedy sequel that makes everything just a little goofier. With a new director behind the camera and some added visual flair, can Nobody 2 surprise us like the first one did?
title: Nobody 2 Review

author: IGN
description:
Join developer Astral Clocktower Studios for a deep dive into the world of Kristala in this latest video for the dark fantasy action RPG. 

Step into the otherworldly realm of Ailur, learn about the story, and how the Mad King’s war shaped modern-day Ailur and continues to disrupt throughout its lands. This dev diary also showcases character customization and more. Kristala is available now in Early Access on PC (via Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Kristala #DevDiary
title: Kristala - Official Dev Diary #1: The Fractured World of Ailur Video

author: IGN
description: Check out the Early Access Announcement Trailer for Crosswind, an upcoming pirate-themed survival adventure game developed by Crosswind Crew. Players will explore a procedurally generated open world to set sail on the open seas, engage in intense melee-based battles, and craft using resources to survive in the Age of Piracy. Crosswind is launching into Early Access in 2026 for PC (Steam).
title: Crosswind - Official Early Access Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Behind the Scenes Featurette for Jurassic Park: Survival, an upcoming first-person single-player action-adventure game developed by Saber Interactive. Hear from the team at Saber and NBCUniversal on the process of bringing players back to the original movie and recreating the many wonders and dangers of Isla Nublar. Jurassic Park: Survival is coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Jurassic Park: Survival - Official Behind the Scenes Featurette

author: IGN
description:
Hit by a blizzard, a grief-stricken loner (Emma Thompson) gets lost among backroads near a Minnesotan lake and stops for help at a remote cabin in the woods. 

Here she discovers a young woman (Laurel Marsden) kidnapped by a desperate couple (Judy Greer, Marc Menchaca) who are armed and intent on murder. Isolated and without cell service, this unlikely hero realizes she is the woman’s only hope of survival.

#IGN #DeadOfWinter #Thriller
title: Dead of Winter - Official Trailer (2025) Emma Thompson, Laurel Marsden, Marc Menchaca

author: IGN
description: This animated trailer introduces you to Of Peaks and Tides' world, where civilizations built by human tribes once thrived and lived in harmony. But that peace was destroyed by a war of the gods, who abandoned the land and let it fall victim to flooding, sandstorms, and blizzards. Now, it's up to you to survive this harsh land, reclaim it, and help rebuild.
title: Of Peaks and Tides - Official Animated Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Coming to #gamescom2025 with a hands-on demo. Of Peaks and Tides brings a world where every move matters — get ready.

#IGN
title: Of Peaks and Tides - Official Announcement Trailer | Reclaim
